summary: Douglass Cecil North  was an American economist.
full_text: Douglass Cecil North  was an American economist known for his work in economic history. He was the co-recipient  of the 1993 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences. In the words of the Nobel Committee, North and Fogel were awarded the prize "for having renewed research in economic history by applying economic theory and quantitative methods in order to explain economic and institutional change."
title: Douglass North
